turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was wondering if you could help me order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking for a I want a venti caffe latte with whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a venti latte with whole milk, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where do you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The address is 13170 North Hazel Dell Parkway, Carmel, Indiana.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at Hazel Dell Pkwy.
